players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie seems like a friendly guy, but I'd rather wait and observe him some more before making any decisions."
Charlie: "Accusing me outright on Day 1 feels rushed, Diana. Let’s focus on gathering more info before making a decision."
Charlie: "Let's not rush to judgment, Diana. Alice makes a good point—patience will help us find the real threat. Who else seems suspicious based on our talks so far?"
Diana: "Waiting to act only helps the mafioso. Charlie is guilty—I have proof from last night. We must vote him out now to save the town."
